location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Assistant Surgeon James McAlister, Bushire, to Lt-Col Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: McAlister writes to Hennell, responding in great detail to Porter's response (ff 19-20) to his version of events in his complaint against Porter (initially outlined in f 15). McAlister requests that Hennell have no objections to him making copies of this and his previous letter, to send to His Lordship in Council (Government of Bombay), for his opinion on the matter.
